mainText:
RIP Steve Jobs, I will be never be able to thank him enough for my  
favorite electronic devices, my dear iPhone 3 and 4 and my MacBook! :'(

I think he was one of few real visionaries in the world. I've never  
felt like this with any person i didn't knew in person. It is a real  
loss for the world.

My sincere condolences for his family, friends and co-workers.
author: Liliabel
